page.title: 11 Charities
page.content: {Male singing choir}performs by request for local charities. Schools put on tea and a play for old folks of the parish at Christmas.{Charity week organised by the Madge family include fete, dog show, football married/ singles match, rounders and dance.A remedial bed for Lanson hospital was paid for this way.{Safari suppers organised by the church are a popular social event.One member each provides a course and diners drive from house to house.{Clay Pigeon shooting arranged by the young farmers club for both sexes. Inter-parish matches of {Skittles and Whist drives}are well supported.{W.I.}strictly a womans domain caters for social and charity needs.With parents on a duty rota the school swimming pool is used in the holidays.{Sports day}a highly competitive event combines 3 schools.
